LightningComponentBundle.description: Use a SOQL string to fetch data and columns.

property.name: queryString
property.label: SOQL String
property.placeholder: SELECT Id, Name FROM Account LIMIT 10
property.description: Parent (one level) relationships supported (e.g. Account.Type).

property.name: editableFields
property.label: Editable Fields
property.description: Comma separated list of Field API names for inline editing. Does not support parent relationship (Account.Type). Saving writes to server

property.name: sortableFields
property.label: Sortable Fields
property.description: Comma separated list of Field API names. Parent relationship is supported (e.g. Account.Type).

property.name: sortedBy
property.label: Default Sort Field
property.description: Single Field API Name. Parent relationship is supported (e.g. Account.Type).

property.name: actionConfigDevName
property.label: Action Configuration
property.description: Configure table and row actions with a record in Datatable_Config__mdt

property.name: lookupConfigDevName
property.label: Lookup Configuration
property.description: Configure inline edit lookup search behavior with a record in Datatable_Config__mdt

property.name: useRelativeMaxHeight
property.label: Limit Height (Relative to screen)
property.description: Force table height to 60% of the vertical screen space. To set a custom percentage, use this in conjunction with customRelativeMaxHeight

property.name: customRelativeMaxHeight
property.label: Custom Relative Max Height
property.description: Set custom max height relative to the vertical screen space. useRelativeMaxHeight must be true for this to work.

property.name: isRecordBind
property.label: Use Record Binding in SOQL String
property.description: Use $CurrentRecord or $recordId in your SOQL query to use record context. User must have FLS access.
